Package edu.escuelaing.arsw.service.treasure

Class SilverTreasure

java.lang.Object
edu.escuelaing.arsw.service.treasure.Treasure
edu.escuelaing.arsw.service.treasure.SilverTreasure
public class SilverTreasure extends Treasure
The SilverTreasure class represents a specific type of treasure in the game, namely a silver treasure. It extends the abstract Treasure class and provides the specific characteristics for silver treasures.

  • Constructor Details

    • SilverTreasure

      public SilverTreasure()
      Constructs a SilverTreasure instance with a predefined score. Initializes the position of the treasure on the game table to a random location that is either empty or occupied by a police officer or thief.
